name: Bring 'em home
description:
It's time to bring the chickens back home after their day outside. It's a daily chore however it's fun to try and beat your best time. You have to watch out though, it's not always a safe journey home for these chickens.

This is a short fun little game I've been working on in my spare time. I hope you will enjoy it. It's still in it's early days and I will continue to work on it as I have more ideas I'm wanting to try out.

Future ideas include:

  • Character selection and unlockable characters
  • Stat boosts
  • Assign chickens to tasks to help other chickens
  • Endless mode
  • Varying different enemies with different type of attacks

The above are just ideas, I am releasing this proof of concept out to get your feedback to inspire more ideas and learn from your experience playing the game.

If you do like this game, please help support it by leaving a comment or by sharing it to your friends and family. Many thanks!

A little information about the inspiration of this game. I have 3 Chickens in my yard that I sometimes let out to roam around. One day as I was bringing them back to their home I thought of how this could be a game. Chickens won't follow you, unless they're hungry, so I'm having to try and herd them in. I started off with the idea of herding chickens but found the game a bit stressful, and found that having them follow you and overcome obstacles was a lot more rewarding.
